meanings.definition: The act of leaving or setting out
meanings.sent1: Her departure from the party was sudden.
meanings.sent2: The departure of the train was delayed.
meanings.sent3: His departure from the meeting caused a stir.
meanings.sent4: The departure of the sun marked the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The departure of the ship was a grand event.

meanings.definition: A deviation from an expected or usual course
meanings.sent1: The plane's departure from its flight path was concerning.
meanings.sent2: The sudden departure from the plan caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent3: The departure from the norm raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: His departure from tradition was met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent5: The departure from the usual routine brought about new opportunities.
